org.owasp.encoder.tag

Class ForUriTag

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.SimpleTagSupport
      • org.owasp.encoder.tag.EncodingTag
        • org.owasp.encoder.tag.ForUriTag
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.JspTag, javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.SimpleTag

    public class ForUriTag
extends EncodingTag
    A tag to perform percent-encoding of a URL according to RFC 3986. This wraps the Encode.forUri(java.lang.String).
    Author:
    Jeremy Long (jeremy.long@gmail.com)
